content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_block
inventory=[{"type": "netherite_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 13, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 16}, {"type": "birch_stairs", "quantity": 54, "index": 17}, {"type": "birch_leaves", "quantity": 3, "index": 18}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 20}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 7, "index": 26}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 4, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 51, "index": 37}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 9, "index": 38}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 12, "index": 39}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 48, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 14, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a quartz block, I need to place 4 quartz in a square pattern in the crafting grid. The first one will go in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1
